writer_name.description: The last or single name of this writer.

writer_first_name.description: The first name of this writer.

writer_position.description: The position of the writer in the corresponding OWK record (ie. 1 or 2)

language_code.description: The Language code of the name. Values and reference for this field reside in the Language Code Table.

script_code.description: The code representing the language script of this writer name. These values and reference reside in the Script Code Table.
